Glider.description: A personal glider you can deploy by pressing Spacebar while in the air.

Head Torch.description: "Head mounted light source that illuminates the area in front of you. Press T to turn on and off."

Camp Fire.description: Allows you to cook recipe schematics and helps light up the darkest caves.

Cannon Shells.description: Cannon shells for ship cannons. Can be placed inside the ammo boxes of cannons.

Stove.description: A stove for preparing food and drink on a ship.
